10th.courseName: Diploma in Food and Beverage Services
10th.courseDescription: Minimum qualification for admission to diploma courses in Food Production and Food and Beverage Service is a clear pass in the final examination of 10 system of Senior Secondary Examination or its equivalent, with English

Minimum qualification for admission to diploma courses in Bakery and Confectionary  is a clear pass in the final examination of 10 system of Senior Secondary Examination or its equivalent, with English
Minimum qualification for admission to diploma courses in Cookery is a clear pass in the final examination of 10 system of Senior Secondary Examination or its equivalent, with English

12th.courseDescription: Computer Science engineering(CSE) is one of the popular courses among engineering aspirants which focuses on the basic elements of computer programming and networking.
BDS course is focused on training students with knowledge and skills related to general dental practices to treat, prevent and diagnose oral diseases.
BDSc course is focused on training students with knowledge and skills related to general dental practices to treat, prevent and diagnose oral diseases.

ugEngineering.courseDescription: M.E. CSE is a Post Graduate course in engineering with a specialization in the field of computer science and its related aspects. It is a two years course divided into four semesters. A minimum of 55% (relaxable for reserved category candidates) marks at UG level is the least which almost all the institutes desire from applying candidates (in the form of eligibility criterion).

Master of Engineering (ME) in Civil Engineering is a Post Graduate (PG) course in the domain of engineering with a specialization in the field of Civil engineering. The course is of 2 year duration divided into four semesters

M.E. CSE is a Post Graduate course in engineering with a specialization in the field of aeronautical and its related aspects. It is a two years course divided into four semesters. A minimum of 55% (relaxable for reserved category candidates) marks at UG level is the least which almost all the institutes desire from applying candidates (in the form of eligibility criterion).
